# TWS GurukulX — Complete Site Content

> TWS GurukulX (twsgurukul.com) is an India-based trading education platform by Trading With Sidhant LLP. Founded by professional trader Sidhant Kisshor (TEDx Speaker, trading since 2017), we offer structured mentorship programs and courses covering forex, crypto, and Indian stock markets. Our approach combines institutional-grade footprint analysis, rule-based systems, and hands-on mentorship for working professionals.

## About

TWS GurukulX teaches traders to move from guesswork to rule-based, systematic trading. Every program is built around frameworks with clear entry/exit rules, risk management, and trade journaling. The platform serves working professionals in India who can dedicate 1–2 hours in the evening.

**Founder:** Sidhant Kisshor — TEDx Speaker, professional trader since 2017, survived 3 crypto crashes and 2 bear markets.

**Company:** Trading With Sidhant LLP, India.

**Contact:** WhatsApp +91 8062963333 | Website: twsgurukul.com | Checkout: learn.tradingwithsidhant.com

---

## Program 1: Elite Trading Mentorship

**URL:** https://www.twsgurukul.com/mentorship
**Price:** ₹19,999 for 3 months (EMI: ₹1,999/month × 12, no-cost EMI available)
**Daily cost:** ₹222/day | **GST:** 18% applicable
**Batch size:** Capped at 50 per batch (coaches review trades personally)

### What You Get

- Nightly 8 PM IST live trading sessions with pro coaches, 5 nights a week
- 40+ strategy videos and comprehensive course materials
- Weekly performance reviews with personalized feedback
- Whale wallet tracking tools
- WhatsApp support and private community access
- Daily trade ideas and market analysis

### Key Stats

- 2,300+ traders trained since 2023
- 83% complete the full 90 days
- 5 nights a week live sessions

### Who It's For

Working professionals (9–6 jobs) who want hands-on, live mentorship. Sessions are 8–8:30 PM IST so they fit after work. Covers forex, crypto, and Indian stock markets.

### Guarantee

7-day money-back guarantee if you access less than 20% of content. Refund within 7–10 business days to original payment method. No questions asked.

### Frequently Asked Questions

**Q: I work 9-6. How will I manage?**
A: Sessions are 8–8:30 PM IST, designed for working professionals. Most students attend from their phones after dinner.

**Q: I only have ₹50,000 to start. Is that enough?**
A: Yes. We teach position sizing — you decide your own capital. The focus is on the process, not the amount.

**Q: Is crypto trading legal in India?**
A: Yes. Crypto is classified as a Virtual Digital Asset (VDA) under the Income Tax Act. All compliant exchanges must be registered with FIU-IND under PMLA.

**Q: Is this a signals group?**
A: No. We teach you the WHY behind every trade so you can make independent decisions.

**Q: What if I miss sessions?**
A: Replays are provided, but live attendance is strongly encouraged for Q&A and real-time learning.

**Q: Can I do this on my phone?**
A: Yes. Most students trade and attend sessions on their phones.

**Q: Are sessions in Hindi or English?**
A: Mix of both Hindi and English — Hinglish, essentially.

**Q: How is this different from YouTube?**
A: We trade LIVE with real money. You see entries, exits, and risk management in real-time — not theory or cherry-picked replays.

**Q: What if I lose money?**
A: We teach 0.5–1% risk per trade with proper position sizing. Losses are part of trading, but the system keeps them small and controlled.

**Q: What is the refund policy?**
A: Full details at twsgurukul.com/refunds. 7-day refund if less than 20% content accessed.

## Program 2: Footprint Mastery

**URL:** https://www.twsgurukul.com/footprint
**Price:** ₹32,999 one-time (EMI: ₹2,750/month × 12 = ₹90/day)
**GST:** 18% applicable
**Format:** Recorded course + monthly live Q&A + lifetime access

### What You Get

- 10 comprehensive modules on institutional order flow analysis
- Monthly live Q&A sessions (first Saturday of the month, recordings provided)
- Real footprint chart analysis examples
- Risk management tools and templates
- 1-page entry checklist system
- Private community access
- Lifetime access with free updates

### The F.A.S.T. Framework

A systematic approach to order flow analysis that removes guesswork:

1. **Find** — Liquidity zones and likely stop clusters
2. **Assess** — Absorption vs exhaustion on the footprint
3. **Sync** — Price action with cumulative delta alignment
4. **Trade** — Pre-defined entry, invalidation, and position size

### What You'll Learn

- Footprint reading: See what the big players are doing, live
- Delta confirmation: Verify if the trend is real or a trap
- Liquidity zones: Know where stop-loss hunts will happen
- Entry rules: 1-page checklist with entry, SL, and target defined
- Trade journal: Review every trade, improve every week

### Key Stats

- 1,263+ paid learners
- 73% win rate (sample: 1,847 tracked trades)
- ₹27.2 Cr student-reported profits
- 67% completion rate (vs 15% industry average)

### Before & After

**Before TWS:** Follow price action alone, chase breakouts after they happen, no clear invalidation levels, use lagging indicators only, reactive decision making.

**After TWS:** See order flow in real-time, identify absorption patterns, clear risk management levels, confirm with delta divergence, F.A.S.T. framework execution.

### Guarantee

7-day refund policy if less than 20% accessed. Lifetime access to course materials. Free updates included.

### Frequently Asked Questions

**Q: Is this legal?**
A: Yes. We use publicly available market data for educational purposes only.

**Q: How fast will I see results?**
A: You can apply the checklist from Day 1. Consistent results depend on practice and discipline.

**Q: Does it work beyond crypto?**
A: Yes. The concepts generalize to indices, forex, and other instruments with order flow data.

**Q: Will I get trade calls?**
A: No. We teach you the process so you can identify setups independently.

**Q: EMI and refund options?**
A: Yes — 3 to 24 month EMI available. 7-day refund if less than 20% content accessed.

**Q: I'm a complete beginner. Will I understand?**
A: Yes. Module 1 covers all the basics. No prior footprint experience required.

**Q: I don't have much time. How long does it take?**
A: About 1 hour per day. Most students complete the 10 modules in 4–6 weeks.

**Q: Does it work for Indian markets?**
A: The concepts are universal. Examples primarily use BTC/ETH but the framework applies to any market.

**Q: I've bought courses before and never finished. Why is this different?**
A: Our 67% completion rate vs 15% industry average comes from monthly live Q&A, WhatsApp community accountability, and a structured 10-module path.

**Q: What if I don't like it?**
A: 7-day refund if you've accessed less than 20% of the content.

## Program 3: Crypto Mastery

**URL:** https://www.twsgurukul.com/crypto
**Price:** ₹19,499 one-time (EMI: ₹1,625/month × 12)
**GST:** 18% applicable
**Format:** 12-week recorded curriculum + monthly live Q&A + lifetime access

### What You Get

- 12-week self-paced recorded curriculum
- Monthly live Q&A and trade review sessions (recordings provided)
- Scanners, checklists, and position sizing sheets (ready-to-use tools)
- Private community access
- Trade journal framework
- Lifetime access with updates

### The 5-Step Execution Framework

1. **See the Market the Way Institutions Do** — Master Support/Resistance, Daily/Weekly Naked Levels, VWAP, Fibonacci, and Moving Averages the way professionals use them.
2. **Find the Setups Worth Your Capital** — Top-Down Analysis, proven chart patterns, and the Fixed Range Tool to filter noise.
3. **Stack Confluence Until the Trade Has No Argument** — VMC indicator confluence, Divergence Reversals, SuperPattern Strategy, and the Structure Failure Pattern.
4. **Execute Like the Market Owes You Nothing** — Professional exchange precision and psychological framework.
5. **The Edge That Compounds Over Time** — Pro Trading Checklist and the top 5 tools serious traders use.

### Daily Routine

- **Time:** 7–9 PM (2 hours, designed for working professionals)
- **Process:** Scan with checklist → Plan entries and exits → Set alerts → Journal

### Key Stats

- 1,263 enrolled learners
- 73% reported win rate (sample: 1,847 trades)
- 2.1:1 average risk-reward ratio
- ₹27.2 Cr self-reported student profits
- 2 hours daily commitment

### Verified Student Results

- Rahul Sharma (Software Engineer, Bangalore, 28): ₹1.5 Lakhs in 3 months. Win rate improved from ~30% to 68%.
- Priya Patel (Chartered Accountant, Mumbai, 32): ₹2.3 Lakhs in 4 months. Consistent since month 2.
- Amit Kumar (Doctor MBBS, Delhi, 35): ₹42,000 in 3 months. Breakeven month 1, profitable since month 2.
- Sneha Agarwal (Marketing Manager, Pune, 29): ₹1.8 Lakhs in 4 months. Best month: ₹72K.
- Vikash Singh (Business Analyst, Hyderabad, 26): ₹95,000 in 2 months. First profitable week: Week 3.
- Anjali Mehta (Banking Professional, Ahmedabad, 31): ₹2.7 Lakhs in 6 months. Most consistent on BTC/ETH pairs.
- Rohit Gupta (IT Consultant, Noida, 33): ₹28,000 in 2 months. Still working through advanced modules.
- Kavita Rao (HR Professional, Chennai, 30): ₹1.3 Lakhs in 3 months. 7 out of 12 weeks profitable.
- Manish Jain (Chartered Accountant, Jaipur, 34): ₹2.9 Lakhs in 5 months. Average risk-reward: 2.1:1.
- Deepak Verma (Government Employee, Lucknow, 37): ₹1.6 Lakhs in 4 months. Average monthly: ₹35–45K.

All results verified between November 2024 and January 2025.

### Frequently Asked Questions

**Q: Is this live or recorded?**
A: Recorded program + one monthly live Q&A (recordings provided). Learn at your pace, then join live sessions for doubt-solving and trade reviews.

**Q: Is crypto trading legal in India?**
A: Yes — buying, selling, and holding crypto is legal in India. Crypto is classified as a Virtual Digital Asset (VDA) under the Income Tax Act but is not legal tender. All compliant exchanges must be registered with FIU-IND under PMLA. We teach methods and risk control, not specific token recommendations.

**Q: What about crypto taxes in India?**
A: Key rules as of 2026: 30% flat tax on all VDA gains (no deductions except cost of acquisition). 1% TDS on sell transactions above ₹50,000/year. 18% GST on platform trading/service fees (from July 2025). Losses from crypto cannot be set off against other income or carried forward. Consult a CA for your specific situation.

**Q: What about exchange risk and self-custody?**
A: Counterparty risk exists. We include a self-custody primer and risk checklist. Learn to minimize exchange exposure and protect your assets properly.

**Q: Can I do this on my phone or do I need a laptop?**
A: Both are taught; laptop preferred for analysis. Many students trade successfully on mobile.

**Q: What if I miss a live Q&A session?**
A: Recording and written summary provided. All live sessions are recorded.

**Q: How much capital do I need to start trading?**
A: The program teaches position sizing and risk management — you decide your own capital. Many students start small and scale up as they gain confidence.

**Q: I'm a complete beginner — will I be able to follow along?**
A: Yes. The program starts from zero and assumes no prior crypto experience. Our students include doctors, CAs, software engineers, government employees, and marketing managers.

**Q: What's the actual daily time commitment?**
A: The system is built around a 2-hour evening routine (7–9 PM). You scan with a checklist, plan entries and exits, set alerts, and journal. Designed for working professionals who can't watch charts all day.

**Q: Is there a refund policy?**
A: Yes. We have a published refund policy at twsgurukul.com/refunds. 7-day refund if less than 20% content accessed.

## Free Tools

### Prop Firm Safety Checker

**URL:** https://www.twsgurukul.com/prop-firm-safety-checker

A free tool to verify if a prop trading firm is legitimate before you risk your money. Checks registration status, community reviews, and common red flags. No signup required.

### Trading Style Quiz

**URL:** https://www.twsgurukul.com/quiz

A short quiz to help you discover your ideal trading style and get a personalized program recommendation. Covers risk tolerance, available time, preferred markets, and trading personality.
